page.title: 05My Church.
page.content: I go to a United Reformed Church.It stands on the corner of Mitchell Road opposite the Old Peoples Home.Services are held every Sunday at 10.00am,2nd Sunday evening of every month at 6.30. Our service begins with a passage from the Bible,continues with a hymn/song, then a teaching followed again with singing.Mr Mellor(our minister)then takes up the offering of our money and we pray.Notices concerning the church for the week are read by an Elder.This is followed by singing and prayers which includes the Lords Prayer.The children leave the service for Sunday School.We have five age groups a creche(under 3)3-6,7-10,11-13,13 on. People from our church are very friendly,welcoming visitors like William who came from Papua New Guinea for 3 months working with the church.
